newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-CVRD still a hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-CVRD still a hold.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said in a report it was maintaining its hold rating on Brazil's Companhia Vale do Rio Doce (CVRD) .
-- The report follows Tuesday's sale of a 41.73 percent voting stake in CVRD to a group led by Brazilian steelmaker CSN .
-- Salomon Brothers said it expects the new controlling shareholders of CVRD to be well positioned to take advantage of many common strategies.
-- CVRD's iron ore business unit will benefit from CSN steel demand as well as from several energy and infrastructure projects in which both companies are currently participating, it said.
-- It also said it expects the railroad, ports, and shipping operations to benefit from this consortium.
-- On Wednesday, Vale preferred closed off 8.09 percent at 25.55 reais. The common stock ended flat at 28.90 reais.
